docs.snippet: French officials should address the real terrorist threat, and not try to dictate to Muslim women what they may not wear....
docs.lead_paragraph: French officials should address the real terrorist threat, and not try to dictate to Muslim women what they may not wear.
docs.abstract: Editorial condemns decision by several French mayors to ban 'burkini,' full body-covering swimwear worn by Muslim women, at public beaches; cautions ban threatens to further stigmatize and marginalize Muslims at time when terrorist attacks in France have stoked Islamophobia.
